page.title: 04Lower Stoke Holy Cross
page.content: In and around Lower Stoke Holy Cross much of the land is farmland and marsh land. About twenty people wwork on the farms now whilst most of the people work in Norwich. Half a mile to the east lies Upper Stoke Holy Cross. About eight hundred people live in Stoke Holy Cross, and all are very kind and helpful. There is one shop in the village which sells most things. There are many clubs and societies in the village with the church taking a leading part in many. There is one school, the six teachers there teaching the 120 children from Stoke Holy Cross, Caistor St. Edmunds, and Shotesham. There are five large farms in the village.
